name: Downhill Skater
description:
Play with Controller (Best option) or keyboard (WASD)

Controls:

A - D or Left Thumbstick to move and turn.

Pushing forward  W increases speed.

Enter or Select to respawn faster when falling

To force a powerslide, turn quickly from one side to the other.

This is a prototype with one demo level. Game is in development with more levels coming.
